Returns: true if the action view was collapsed, false otherwise.
collapseActionView().Description: Collapse the action view associated with this menu item. The menu item must have an action view set, as well as the showAsAction flag @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#SHOW_AS_ACTION_COLLAPSE_ACTION_VIEW_E@. If a listener has been set using @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#setSupportOnActionExpandListener_E@ it will have its @B_android#support#v4#view#MenuItemCompat#OnActionExpandListener#onMenuItemActionCollapse_E@ method invoked. The listener may return false from this method to prevent collapsing the action view.

Returns: true if the item's action view is expanded, false otherwise.
isActionViewExpanded().Description: Returns true if this menu item's action view has been expanded.

Returns: This Item so additional setters can be called.
Parameters: View to use for presenting this item to the user.
setActionView(android.view.View).Description: Set an action view for this menu item. An action view will be displayed in place of an automatically generated menu item element in the UI when this item is shown as an action within a parent. @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#setSupportActionProvider_E@.

Returns: This Item so additional setters can be called.
Parameters: Layout resource to use for presenting this item to the user.
setActionView(int).Description: Set an action view for this menu item. An action view will be displayed in place of an automatically generated menu item element in the UI when this item is shown as an action within a parent. @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#setSupportActionProvider_E@.

Returns: This MenuItem instance for call chaining.
Parameters: How the item should display. One of @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#SHOW_AS_ACTION_ALWAYS_E@, @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#SHOW_AS_ACTION_IF_ROOM_E@, or @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#SHOW_AS_ACTION_NEVER_E@. SHOW_AS_ACTION_NEVER is the default.
setShowAsActionFlags(int).Description: Sets how this item should display in the presence of an Action Bar. The parameter actionEnum is a flag set. One of @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#SHOW_AS_ACTION_ALWAYS_E@, @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#SHOW_AS_ACTION_IF_ROOM_E@, or @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#SHOW_AS_ACTION_NEVER_E@ should be used, and you may optionally OR the value with @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#SHOW_AS_ACTION_WITH_TEXT_E@. SHOW_AS_ACTION_WITH_TEXT requests that when the item is shown as an action, it should be shown with a text label. Note: This method differs from @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#setShowAsAction_E@ only in that it returns the current MenuItem instance for call chaining.

Returns: This Item so additional setters can be called.
setSupportActionProvider(android.support.Description: Sets the @B_android#support#v4#view#ActionProvider_E@ responsible for creating an action view if the item is placed on the action bar. The provider also provides a default action invoked if the item is placed in the overflow menu. @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#setActionView_E@ or @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#setActionView_E@.

Returns: This menu item instance for call chaining
Parameters: Listener that will respond to expand/collapse events
setSupportOnActionExpandListener(android.Description: Set an @B_android#support#v4#view#MenuItemCompat#OnActionExpandListener_E@ on this menu item to be notified when the associated action view is expanded or collapsed. The menu item must be configured to expand or collapse its action view using the flag @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#SHOW_AS_ACTION_COLLAPSE_ACTION_VIEW_E@.

getActionView().Description: Returns the currently set action view for this menu item.

expandActionView().Description: Expand the action view associated with this menu item. The menu item must have an action view set, as well as the showAsAction flag @B_android#support#v4#internal#view#SupportMenuItem#SHOW_AS_ACTION_COLLAPSE_ACTION_VIEW_E@. The listener may return false from this method to prevent expanding the action view.

ClassDesc: Interface for direct access to a previously created menu item. An Item is returned by calling one of the @B_android#view#Menu#add_E@ methods. For a feature set of specific menu types, see @B_android#view#Menu_E@.
